subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Cuauhtemoc Blanco quickly showed his ability yesterday in his Major League Soccer debut for the Chicago Fire. Blanco set up Ivan Guerrero for the game’s first goal, leading the visiting Fire past Toronto F.C., 3-0.The 34-year-old Blanco, twice Mexico’s most valuable player, found Guerrero slicing in toward the goal with a perfectly lofted pass. Chicago (5-8-4) had scored 13 goals in its previous 16 games.
